TopicTitle: Land on all of Kerbin's tallest peaks

Articles.Content:
Kerbin has 14 mountains over 6000 meters in height, separated from taller peaks by at least 500 meters in height (500 meter prominence).

The goal of this challenge is to land the same Kerbal on each and every one of them in a single epic mission using any method you can, except cheats or exploits. Your Kerbal should reach over 6000 meters on every landing, and ideally reach the summit.

A map of the locations of all fourteen 6000ers.

 

A rather stylized image of some of them.
